name: The Link Factory
description:
TIP: Hit the fullscreen button

Hey there I made this little game, called The Link Factory. By rotating the links to the heart machine parts you can dodge the obstacles.  The game is score based, and each time you lose health the score speed decreases. 

Dani Basement Jam #3

 -It's made for the Dani Basement Jam #3, and it fits in the theme like this:

  The several machine parts are linked together with the links you can rotate.

So now have a lot of fun and get the highest score.
